Technical Skills
Frontend Development:

Proficiency in HTML5, CSS3, and JavaScript.

Experience with modern JavaScript frameworks like React, Angular, or Vue.js.

Knowledge of responsive design principles and cross-browser compatibility.

Backend Development:

Strong command of server-side languages such as Java, Python, Node.js, or PHP.

Experience with backend frameworks like Spring Boot (Java), Django (Python), or Express.js (Node.js).

Understanding of RESTful API design and integration.

Database Management:

Familiarity with relational databases like MySQL or PostgreSQL.

Experience with NoSQL databases such as MongoDB or Redis for handling unstructured data.

DevOps and Deployment:

Knowledge of containerization tools like Docker and orchestration platforms like Kubernetes.

Experience with cloud services (e.g., AWS, Azure, or Alibaba Cloud) for scalable deployment.

Proficiency in CI/CD pipelines and version control systems like Git.

Security and Compliance:

Understanding of web security protocols and best practices.

Familiarity with data protection regulations relevant to your target audience.

๐๏ธ Soft Skills
Problem-Solving: Ability to troubleshoot issues and optimize performance.

Communication: Clear articulation of technical concepts to non-technical stakeholders.

Project Management: Experience with Agile methodologies and tools like Jira or Trello.

Adaptability: Willingness to learn new technologies and adapt to changing project requirements.
